attributes.action: Removal of Colin Brewer MP Period!
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, demand the immediate removal resignation of  Colin Brewer and ask he is never allowed to stand for election as a candidate in any ways shape or form in any kind of election - period.

Mr. Brewer has already been forced to resign his commission to his own party following defamatory and abusive remarks towards the disabled of this country, and now as an independent still maintains these deplorable views despite the obvious distaste of his constituents and the country.

He must NEVER be in a position of authority ever again!
